channel.title: iPhone and iPad owners: iOS 14.4 is a critical security update
channel.description:
Those who are more on top of things than I am may already have updated when this was announced at the end of January, but if you haven’t done so, it's strongly recommended that you install this update asap...
https://www.forbes.com/sites/gordonkelly/2021/01/28/apple-ios-144-release-should-you-upgrade/

item.title: iPhone and iPad owners: iOS 14.4 is a critical security update

item.description:
Those who are more on top of things than I am may already have updated when this was announced at the end of January, but if you haven’t done so, it’s strongly recommended that you install this update asap…

Forbes

Apple iOS 14.4 Release: Should You Upgrade?

Apple iOS 14.4 is a critical update and iPhone users need to update ASAP. This is why...
